name: Witch Way (mickeymouska)
description:
WASD for Witch Player

Arrow Keys for Villager

Villager: try to catch the witch by trapping her in your trail of fire, but be careful not to go into the haunted forest!

Witch: your curse will happen in 30 seconds and then you can disappear, you  just need to stay in the town square and avoid the villager's fire!

Spacebar to reset at any time.
